name: RetrieveEmailRecords
description:
Retrieve email records by ID or custom property.

This tool retrieves email records from HubSpot CRM by providing record IDs or using a custom unique value property. It should be called when you need details about specific email records stored within HubSpot.

parameters.name: email_records_data
parameters.description: JSON data for fetching email records. Includes properties like `propertiesWithHistory`, `idProperty`, `inputs`, and `properties` to define retrieval specifics.

propertiesWithHistory.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object and their histories.

idProperty.description: When using a custom unique value property to retrieve records, the name of the property. Do not include this parameter if retrieving by record ID.

properties.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object.

parameters.name: only_archived_records
parameters.description: Set to true to return only archived email records from HubSpot CRM.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.
